casebody.data:
Dean S. LEE
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 13, 2017

Craig A. Sullivan, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Denise B. Smoker, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Dean S. Lee's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 173 Conn.App. 379, 163 A.3d 702 (2017), is denied.
